text: Yo pana bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī ti pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī ti pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 81. Should any bhikkhu, (acting as part of) a united Community, give robe-cloth (to an individual bhikkhu) and later complain, "The bhikkhus allocate the Community's gains according to friendship," it is to be confessed.
๘๑. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใด (พร้อมใจ) ด้วยสงฆ์ผู้พร้อมเพรียงกันให้จีวร(แก่ภิกษุ) แล้วภายหลังถึงธรรมคือบ่นว่าว่า “ภิกษุทั้งหลายน้อมลาภของสงฆ์ไปตามชอบใจ” เป็นปาจิตตีย์

81. Should any bhikkhu (after forming part) of a Sangha in concord that has given a robe (to a bhikkhu), later engage in decrying that activity thus: "Bhikkhus appropriate the Sangha's gains according to their whims," it entails expiation.
